info.name: Gmail Autohide Sidebar Reloaded
info.description:
Sidebar is automatically hidden. Move the mouse to the left edge of the screen to make it reappear. 

Based on [1] with minor improvements.

[1] https://userstyles.org/styles/36980/gmail-autohide-sidebar

data.title: Help me get a clean look on Gmail in seconds
still hides part of my email?
